name: Misc Changes

pages.title: MEGA potion!
pages.text: Now you can:$(br)$(li)Combine Vanilla potions$(br)$(li)Extend Durations of Rustic's Elixirs$(br)$(li)Increase Potency of Blood Magic's Flasks$(br)And finally...$(br)$(li)Combine this three types into one MEGA potion

pages.title: ExNihilio Hammers
pages.text: $(l)ExNihilio/$ hammers and their $(l)ExCompressum/$ analogs was removed. Use $(l)Tinker's/$ sledge hammers instead.

pages.title: EvT Solar Panels
pages.text: All 6 $(l)Void Miner/$ and $(l)Solar/$ Controller's recipes was changed.$(br)Energy output was significally changed too.$(br)$(l:energy/environmental_tech)<<See more>>/$
